title: The Incised image
brief_description: A film on the work of Charles Lloyd showing in detail the dry-point technique of etching and the possibilities of one-plate colour printing which he studied at Atelier 17 in Paris. Culminates in an animated sequence interpreting his statement - “each print is an adventure, a little journey of discovery”. The commentary is edited from his recorded discussions.
